/config.description: Choose a Share for NZBGet configuration. Eg: create a Share called nzb-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

/downloads.description: Choose a Share for NZBGet downloads. Eg: create a Share called nzbget-downloads for this purpose alone. You can also assign other media Shares on the system after installation.
/downloads.label: Download Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run NZBGet as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run NZBGet as.

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run NZBGet as.

NZBGet.description:
The most efficient usenet downloader.

Based on a custom OCI image: https://hub.docker.com/r/linuxserver/nzbget, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
